channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (far_out)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Meghan Trainor @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-08-09 01:30 — Meghan Trainor at Chase Center. Meghan Trainor's tour promises a fresh take on her pop sound, appealing to a broad audience.

item.title: Ariana Grande @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-06-07 03:00 → 2026-06-11 03:00 — Ariana Grande at Oakland Arena. Red Rum Club is gaining traction in the indie scene with their unique blend of rock and pop.

item.title: Forrest Frank @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-07-15 02:00 — Forrest Frank at Oakland Arena. Forrest Frank's tour is intriguing, tapping into a youthful and vibrant sound.

item.title: RUSH @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-10-16 02:30 → 2026-10-18 02:30 — RUSH at SAP Center at San Jose. RUSH's legacy continues to draw fans, making their tour a nostalgic experience for many.

item.title: Three Days Grace @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-11-19 03:00 — Three Days Grace at SAP Center at San Jose. Three Days Grace continues to be a strong presence in rock, appealing to long-time fans.

item.title: Rainbow Kitten Surprise @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-19 03:00 — Rainbow Kitten Surprise at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Rainbow Kitten Surprise is known for their energetic performances and unique sound.

item.title: Jack Johnson @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-10-01 01:30 → 2026-10-02 01:30 — Jack Johnson at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Jack Johnson's laid-back style and strong following make his shows a relaxing experience.

item.title: Evanescence @ Shoreline Amphitheatre
item.description: 2026-07-21 02:00 — Evanescence at Shoreline Amphitheatre. Evanescence's tour with Spiritbox and Nova Twins promises a powerful rock experience.

item.title: The Neighbourhood @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-10-08 02:30 — The Neighbourhood at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. The Neighbourhood's tour is a chance to see their evolving sound live.

item.title: Train @ Shoreline Amphitheatre
item.description: 2026-08-27 01:45 — Train at Shoreline Amphitheatre. Train's anniversary tour is a nostalgic draw for fans of their classic hits.

item.title: Bob Moses @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-18 02:30 — Bob Moses at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. The combination of Bob Moses and Cannons promises an engaging electronic experience.

item.title: O.A.R. @ The Masonic
item.description: 2026-08-13 01:30 — O.A.R. at The Masonic. O.A.R. brings a feel-good vibe that resonates well with their dedicated fanbase.

item.title: Rick Springfield @ Uptown Theatre Napa
item.description: 2026-05-31 03:00 — Rick Springfield at Uptown Theatre Napa. Rick Springfield's nostalgic appeal continues to attract audiences.

item.title: Lucy Dacus @ The Castro Theatre
item.description: 2026-05-19 03:00 — Lucy Dacus at The Castro Theatre. Peter Hook & The Light offers a unique take on classic tracks that resonates with fans.

item.title: Red Rum Club @ The Independent
item.description: 2026-05-20 03:00 — Red Rum Club at The Independent.
